title: Sébastien Ogier
summary: Sébastien Ogier (born 17 December 1983) is a French rally driver, competing for Toyota World Rally Team in the World Rally Championship (WRC), who is teamed with the co-driver Julien Ingrassia.[1] He has won the World Rally Drivers' Championship 8 times, in 2013, 2014, 2015, 2016, 2017, 2018, 2020, and 2021.
